results.name: a little welcome to the internet

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 450/ AMD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: -
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 760/AMD 280 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: -
